00047 class APTLIB_API LogStream : public MsgHandler, public ProgressHandler {
00048 
00049 public:
00051   LogStream(int verbosity=3, std::ostream *out=NULL, bool profile=true);
00052   ~LogStream();

00054   void unsetStream(std::ostream *out);
00055   virtual void message(int verbosity, const std::string &log, bool delimiter = true);
00056   virtual void progressBegin(int verbosity, const std::string &msg, int total);
00057   virtual void progressStep(int verbosity);
00058   virtual void progressEnd(int verbosity, const std::string &msg);
00059   void setBaseVerbosity(int verbosity);
00060

00062   std::string profileString();
